definition: to pick/to pluck/to collect/to select/to choose/to gather
color/complexion/looks/variant of 彩[cai3]/variant of 採|采[cai3]

sentences.english: EXITO's National China Clays Mining Industry Report-Industry Response|Purpose of Survey|Methodology|Survey Response Rate Demographic Data – New Zealand China Clays Mining Industry…
sentences.chinese: 澳洲论文网提供新西兰与中国粘土采矿业研究报告。

sentences.english: Naturally present bacteria are also involved in the mining industry in bioleaching.
sentences.chinese: 天然存在的细菌也应用于采矿行业的生物浸矿。

sentences.english: In this paper the mining practice of extra high grade ore is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要介绍特富矿的采矿实践。

sentences.english: The result obtained is of importance in guiding the ground-pressure control and mining procties.
sentences.chinese: 得出的结论对于控制地压和采矿生产有指导意义。

sentences.english: Article 9 The State implements a system of paid acquisition of the mining right.
sentences.chinese: 第九条国家实行采矿权有偿取得的制度。

sentences.english: Sublevel caving method without sill pillar is adopted in the south section of Fengshan Copper Mine.
sentences.chinese: 丰山铜矿南缘采区应用无底柱分段崩落法采矿。

sentences.english: Yet, ventilation with this method has not been solved very well.
sentences.chinese: 可是，这种采矿法的通风问题尚未很好解决。

sentences.english: Strip Miner I and Ice Harvester I blueprints have been seeded on the market.
sentences.chinese: 单级采矿器I和冰矿采集器I蓝图都已在市场中生成。

sentences.english: The world’s miners dug up 2, 689 tonnes of gold last year.
sentences.chinese: 世界采矿主去年一共挖出了2689吨黄金。

sentences.english: Chinese-owned enterprises have pumped money into Zambia's mining sector in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 近年来，中资企业一直在向赞比亚的采矿业注资。

sentences.english: Although China currently monopolizes rare earth mining, other countries have deposits too.
sentences.chinese: 尽管中国现在垄断了稀土采矿业，其它国家也有储量。

sentences.english: Mining metals from asteroids seems a bonkers idea. But could it work?
sentences.chinese: 小行星采矿这想法听似疯狂，但行得通吗？

sentences.english: Mining and gathering medicine herbs made ecology even worse.
sentences.chinese: 采矿采药加剧生态恶化。

sentences.english: The engineer examined the engine of the  mining  machine for  stomach.
sentences.chinese: 工程师检查采矿机的发动机是否有肚子痛。

sentences.english: Stope ground pressure control is a key issue in an open stope mining process.
sentences.chinese: 采场地压控制是空场采矿法开采工艺的关键环节。

definition: to extract (ore or other resource from a mine)/to exploit/to mine
to prospect/to dig for coal or minerals
